CustomField.description: Object of the Action. By default, the available Objects to select are the ones which include a lookup to Members, that is, any Object related to Members: Badge Member, Challenge Member, Event, Level Member, Member Segment, Member, Point, Redemption, Tracker and Transaction.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the Object of the Action. By default, all Fielo objects related to Members are included.
CustomField.label: Object
